sources.title: Whispering Footsteps (1943)
sources.description: John Hubbard, Rita Quigley Republic Pictures

sources.title: Whispering Footsteps (1943)
sources.description: An Ohio bank clerk's life becomes a nightmare when his descriptions is a fit of a maniac killer. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/whispering-footsteps-1943/

metadata.Plot: A bank clerk in a small town returns home from a vacation in Indianapolis, and hears a story on the radio about a girl found murdered there. The description of the killer fits him exactly, and when two girls are murdered in his town, suspicion falls on him - especially when he can't provide an alibi for the time the girls were killed.
metadata.Actors: John Hubbard, Rita Quigley, Joan Blair
